children.name: title
children.description: Update the title element text. The title element is specified by setting the `role` data attribute to `view-title`.

children.name: destroy
children.description: Prepares the **NavBar** for safe removal from DOM. Detaches all event handlers and removes jQuery.data attributes to avoid memory leaks. Calls destroy method of any child Kendo widgets.> **Important:** This method does not remove the NavBar element from DOM.
